name: Touchandflurry
tagline: A composition/performance/installation using Intonaspacio and instrumentarium of Productions Totem Contemporain
body:
# Touch & Flurry ## Program note


orbiting comet
simmers frosty dust

a fingertip
brushes bare skin

spreads
down the path
a morning dew

---


Comète en orbite
Bouillon de poussière glaciale

Du bout des doigts
Effleure l’épiderme

Étale
Sur son chemin
La rosée

## Performance description Touch & Flurry is a comprovisation for a pair of robotic instruments by Productions Totem Contemporain called *The Pipe* . The instruments are played by an innovative controller called *Intonaspacio* designed by Mailis Rodrigues.
